properties.areaDesc: Point Isabelle to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Huron Islands to Marquette MI; Portage Lake to Huron Island MI to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal To Huron Islands MI Including Keweenaw and Huron Bays
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 14 at 4:32PM EST until January 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves
2 to 4 feet occurring.

* WHERE...Point Isabelle to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal MI,
Lower Entrance of Portage Canal To Huron Islands MI Including
Keweenaw and Huron Bays and Huron Islands to Marquette MI.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY
